metadata.title: CVE-2019-12441 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition 8.4through 11.11. The protected branches feature contained a access controlissue which resulted in a bypass of the protected branches restrictionrules. It has Incorrect Access Control.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
